game.name: SBK™22
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Superbike에 올라타 공식 2022 WorldSBK™에서 레이스하며 실력을 뽐내세요. 출시 10주년을 맞은 SBK™가 최고의 몰입감을 선사하는 타이틀로 돌아왔습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Saddle up your Superbike and show what you’re made of while racing in the official 2022 WorldSBK™. After ten years, SBK™ returns with a title more immersive and engaging than ever!

reviewHighlights.text: Great game when in discount. Even better with sbk24 season mod. Only thing would be hdr turning on randomly when tweaking graphics settings.
Bad game Brakes destroyed, kerb too thick like speed bumps
